    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.contento.se:112417</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CFL</catalog>
            <entry>112417</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Listening Practise: Minimal Pairs</string>
            <string language="en">Listening practice: Minimal Pairs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hörende Praxis: Minimale Paare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pratique d'écoute : Paires Minimales</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Prática escutando: Pares Mínimos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pratica ascoltante: Accoppiamenti Minimi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρακτική ακούσματος: Ελάχιστα ζευγάρια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Práctica que escucha: Pares Mínimos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">In this exercise you listen to different words that contain different vowel sounds and then choose the right word from pairs of written words, similar to each other.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 1 - Let’s Begin!</string>
            <string language="en">In this exercise you listen to different words that contain different vowels sounds and then choose the right word from pairs of written words, similar to each other. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 1 - Let's Begin!</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">The Alphabet</string>
            <string language="sv">Minimal pairs</string>
            <string language="sv">Listening exercise</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">The Alphabet</string>
            <string language="en">Minimal pairs</string>
            <string language="en">Listening exercise</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Übung hören Sie zu den 
unterschiedlichen Wörtern, die unterschiedliche Vokaltöne enthalten 
und dann das rechte Wort von den Paaren der schriftlichen Wörter 
wählen, ähnlich miteinander. Safir - Englisch und Berufsleben 
für Anfänger - Modul 1 - lassen Sie uns anfangen!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cet exercice vous écoutez les différents 
mots qui contiennent différents bruits de voyelles et puis 
choisissent le bon mot des paires de mots écrits, semblables entre 
eux. Safir - l'anglais et vie active pour des débutants - le 
module 1 - commençons !</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neste exercício você escuta as palavras 
diferentes que contêm sons diferentes das vogais e escolhem então a 
palavra direita dos pares de palavras escritas, similares a se. 
Safir - vida do inglês e de funcionamento para novatos - o 
módulo 1 - deixe-nos começar!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa esercitazione ascoltate l'un l'altro le
parole differenti che contengono i suoni differenti di vocali ed 
allora scelgono la giusta parola dagli accoppiamenti delle parole 
scritte, simili. Safir - inglese e vita attiva per i 
principianti - modulo 1 - cominciamo!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την άσκηση ακούτε τις διαφορετικές λέξεις 
που περιέχουν τους διαφορετικούς ήχους φωνηέντων και επιλέγουν 
έπειτα τη σωστή λέξη από τα ζευγάρια των γραπτών λέξεων, 
παρόμοια το ένα με το άλλο. Safir - αγγλική και 
οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 1 - αρχίστε!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En este ejercicio usted escucha diversas palabras
que contengan diversos sonidos de las vocales y después elijan la 
palabra derecha de pares de palabras escritas, similares el uno al 
otro. ¡Safir - inglés y vida laboral para los principiantes - 
el módulo 1 - comencemos!</string>
          </description>
